text: Marilyn vos Savant (born August 11, 1946 in St. Louis) is an American magazine columnist, playwright and author. She became very famous in the Guinness Book of World Records category for having the highest IQ of 228.The Time Everyone "Corrected" the World's Smartest Woman". Priceonomics, February 19, 2015 Since 1986, she has hosted Parade magazine's "Ask Marilyn" column. In the column she answers the questions from readers on a variety of subjects. Guinness retired the "Highest IQ" category in 1990 after concluding IQ tests were too unreliable to designate a single record holder. ==References== Category:American columnists Category:American playwrights Category:Writers from St. Louis, Missouri Category:1946 births Category:Living people
title: Marilyn vos Savant
